committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Education, Arts and Humanities

official_title: A bill to amend the provisions of the Higher Education Act of 1965 relating to treatment by campus officials of sexual assault victims.
short_title: Campus Sexual Assault Victims' Bill of Rights Act of 1991

summary.text: Campus Sexual Assault Victims' Bill of Rights Act of 1991 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 (HEA) to require each eligible institution participating in any program under HEA title IV (Student Assistance) to include a statement of policy regarding the rights of victims of sexual assault, that complies with specified requirements, in its disclosure of campus security policy and campus crime statistics. Requires each institution of higher education to establish and implement a written policy establishing a campus sexual assault victims' bill of rights which provides that specified rights shall be accorded to such victims by all campus officers, administrators, and employees of such institution.

titles.title: Campus Sexual Assault Victims' Bill of Rights Act of 1991
A bill to amend the provisions of the Higher Education Act of 1965 relating to treatment by campus officials of sexual assault victims.
